name: MDalgorithms Inc.
headline: Democratizing Dermatology with AI
description:
MDalgorithms is revolutionizing dermatology by delivering convenient, effective AI-powered solutions for skin and hair care. Since pioneering machine-learning models for acne treatment in 2017, we’ve advanced to develop the world’s first AI-powered scalp analysis for hair regrowth.

Our proprietary AI technology, built entirely in-house, analyzes blemishes, lesions, and hair conditions with unmatched precision, utilizing the largest global dataset of acne and scalp images. Clinically validated and tested by dermatologists, our personalized treatment kits—MDacne for acne and MDhair for hair regrowth—are customized to each individual’s unique needs, combining over 100 medical and botanical ingredients for optimal results.

We empower users to track their progress, adjust treatments as needed, and access real-time support from our team of dermatologists and nurses. By doing so, we make personalized dermatological care accessible to all.
tags: industry:consumer-health-services; industry:consumer; industry:healthcare; industry:telemedicine; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Yoram Harth MD, Founder/Chief Medical Officer
founders.description: Board-certified Dermatologist with a particular passion for helping people with acne.  Former research fellow at the Department of Dermatology Columbia-Presbyterian in New York and a winner of the Wall Street Journal Europe and the Edison awards for his innovations in acne and RF-based home skin treatment rejuvenation.

founders.name: Oded Harth, Founder/CEO
founders.description: Oded Harth is a tech innovator and entrepreneur, celebrated as a Forbes 30 Under 30 honoree and a two-time recipient of the Deloitte Fast 500 USA award. With specialized training in AI and machine learning from Stanford, Oded founded MDalgorithms, a pioneering company transforming the landscape of skin and hair care. Supported by leading Silicon Valley venture capital firms, MDalgorithms is committed to delivering effective, accessible, and affordable treatments to peopl

# Democratizing dermatology with AI.
We deliver convenient, effective solutions in skin and hair for all.
[contact us](https://www.mdalgorithms.com/<#section-contact>)
analyzing... identifying... building kit... recommending:
Hydrating clarifying protecting
![](https://dql5a1uh5bnf3.cloudfront.net/photos/images/000/001/487/original/hero-img01.jpg?1735046377)
backed by
![](https://www.mdalgorithms.com/img/partner01-mobile.png) ![](https://www.mdalgorithms.com/img/partner02-mobile.png) ![](https://www.mdalgorithms.com/img/partner03-mobile.png) ![](https://www.mdalgorithms.com/img/partner04-mobile.png) ![](https://www.mdalgorithms.com/img/partner05-mobile.png) ![](https://www.mdalgorithms.com/img/partner06-mobile.png)
## Pioneers in AI-powered personalized care for all.
In 2017, we were the first to utilize machine-learning models for best-in-class acne treatments. Building on that innovation, we advanced further by creating the world’s first AI-powered scalp analysis for hair regrowth. Today, our cutting-edge AI technology sets the standard, delivering unmatched, personalized care tailored to each individual’s unique needs.
OUR BRANDS
### MDacne
[explore MDACNE](https://www.mdalgorithms.com/<https:/www.mdacne.com>)
![](https://www.mdalgorithms.com/img/promo01.jpg)
### MDhair
[explore MDhair](https://www.mdalgorithms.com/<https:/www.mdhair.co>)
![](https://www.mdalgorithms.com/img/promo02.jpg)
+M Customer images analyzed via our skin & hair AI analysis
+K Treatments shipped to our customers
mins Average time for skin or scalp assessment via our apps
## Our Philosophy
MDalgorithms continues to deliver cutting-edge acne treatment and hair regrowth solutions through a careful, extensive process.
### Best-in-class AI
Our proprietary AI technology, built entirely in-house, sets the gold standard in personalized skin and hair care:
  * Unlike off-the-shelf tools, our AI analyzes blemishes, lesions, and hair conditions with unmatched precision.
  * We’ve compiled the largest global dataset of acne and scalp images, enabling more precise analysis and accurate assessments.
  * Clinically validated and tested by dermatologists to ensure reliable and effective results.


analyzing... identifying... building kit... recommending:
active cleanser supplements treatment cream
![](https://www.mdalgorithms.com/img/vbl01.jpg)
### Customized treatment kits
Based on AI analysis, each individual receives a treatment kit customized to their specific needs.
  * For acne, our treatment creams, cleansers, and moisturizers are customized based on acne severity, skin sensitivity, and other personal factors.
  * For hair regrowth, we offer the world’s first medical-grade, personalized hair loss treatment, addressing the root causes and type of hair loss.
  * With over 100 medical and botanical ingredients, our products are scientifically designed to deliver the best possible outcomes.


![](https://www.mdalgorithms.com/img/vbl02.jpg)
### Superior results
We provide a targeted, effective solution that minimizes irritation while maximizing results — all in a convenient package that minimizes the hassle and guesswork of acne and hair care.
In addition, customers can track their progress, adjust treatments as needed, and access real-time support and guidance from our team of dermatologists and nurses.
![](https://www.mdalgorithms.com/img/vbl03.jpg)
## Superior total care, tailored to You.
Their Products 
Our Products 
One size fits all
vs.
Customized using AI
Retail
vs.
Shipped directly to your door
Expensive dermatologist visit
vs.
Free AI analysis
Costly follow-up costs
vs.
Unlimited medical support
Harmful ingredients
vs.
Cutting-edge, clean ingredients
Cosmetic grade with limited functionality
vs.
High-efficacy, clinically-tested proprietary formulas
## Verified Clinical Study
MDhair’s treatment kits have been clinically validated. They were rigorously tested in a six-month study in the USA, which was approved by an Institutional Review Board. The study demonstrated statistically significant improvements in hair growth, coverage, and thickness.
**0** reported an overall improvement in their hair after 4 weeks.
**0** reported a reduction in the brittleness of their hair after 4 weeks.
**0** reported reduction of shedding of their hair after 12 weeks.
**0** reported an overall improvement in the shine of their hair after 12 weeks.
## It doesn’t stop at clinical trials.
Explore more of our published research.
![JID](https://www.mdalgorithms.com/img/JID.png)
Computer vision AI-based androgenetic hair loss analysis using a novel direct to consumer mobile web app.
_JID Dermatology, Volume 143, Issue 5, S34, 2023._
![JID](https://www.mdalgorithms.com/img/JID.png)
AI-based customization in hair loss treatment: a 6-month clinical trial with TEWL and scanning electron microscopy.
_JID Dermatology, volume 144, issue 8, S166, August 2024._
![EADV](https://www.mdalgorithms.com/img/EADV.png)
Electron microscopic analysis of 6-month customized, AI-based topical and oral treatment effects on hair strand quality.
_European Academy of Dermatology Amsterdam, September 2024._
![EADV](https://www.mdalgorithms.com/img/EADV.png)
AI-based customized treatments for scalp health: 6-month trial on transepidermal water loss.
_European Academy of Dermatology Amsterdam, September 2024._
![JDD](https://www.mdalgorithms.com/img/JDD.png)
AI-based personalization of treatment regimen for hair loss: A 6-month clinical trial
_Journal of Drugs in Dermatology (submitted for publication, July 2024._
![JAAD](https://www.mdalgorithms.com/img/JAAD.png)
Large-scale rapid and efficient acne research using a novel direct-to-consumer mobile app
_Journal of the American Academy of Dermatology, Volume 76, issue 6, supplement 1, ab422, June 2017._
![AAD](https://www.mdalgorithms.com/img/AAD.png)
The MDacne App: Democratizing Acne Treatment with AI
_American Academy of Dermatology Innovation Academy, Vancouver, March 2017._
![BIOMEDICAL](https://www.mdalgorithms.com/img/BIOMEDICAL.png)
Deep Learning-Based Acne Apps Can Solve the Problem of Ineffective Office Consultations
_Biomedical Journal of Scientific & Technical Research, Volume 6, Issue 5, pages 5559-5560, July 2018._
## Our Founders
![](https://www.mdalgorithms.com/img/Yoram.png)
### Dr. Yoram Harth
Chief Medical Officer Board-Certified Dermatologist
Dr. Yoram Harth is a world renown dermatologist, former research fellow at the Department of Dermatology at Columbia Presbyterian in New York, and author of many scientific publications. He is a member of the American Academy of Dermatology and the American Hair Research Society. Dr. Harth has won the Wall Street Journal-Europe Award and the Edison Award for his innovations in dermatology and aesthetic treatments.
![](https://www.mdalgorithms.com/img/Oded.png)
### Oded Harth
CEO Forbes '30 Under 30'
Oded Harth is a tech innovator and entrepreneur, celebrated as a Forbes 30 Under 30 honoree and a two-time recipient of the Deloitte Fast 500 USA award. With specialized training in AI and machine learning from Stanford, Oded founded MDalgorithms, a pioneering company transforming the landscape of skin and hair care. Supported by leading Silicon Valley venture capital firms, MDalgorithms is committed to delivering effective, accessible, and affordable treatments to people around the world.
## Contact us
contact@mdalgorithms.com
© 2025 MDalgorithms Inc. All Rights Reserved.

generated_description:
**MDalgorithms Inc.: Democratizing Dermatology with AI**

Founded in 2017 as part of Y Combinator's Batch W17, MDalgorithms Inc. is based in San Francisco and is on a mission to make dermatological care accessible to everyone. This isn’t just a lofty goal; they’re executing it through cutting-edge, AI-powered solutions for skin and hair care.

**The Essence of Innovation**

Initially, the company began with pioneering machine-learning models for acne treatment. Fast forward to today, and they’ve developed the world’s first AI-powered scalp analysis tool designed for hair regrowth. With proprietary AI technology crafted entirely in-house, MDalgorithms analyzes conditions like acne, blemishes, and hair issues with unmatched precision. This is made possible by leveraging the largest global dataset of acne and scalp images.

**Personalized Care, Made Easy**

Their flagship products, MDacne for acne treatment and MDhair for hair regrowth, go above and beyond typical solutions. They offer personalized treatment kits tailored specifically to an individual’s unique skin and hair needs. Each kit is enriched with over 100 medical and botanical ingredients, clinically validated for safety and efficacy, ensuring optimal results. Users gain the ability to track their progress, adjust their treatments in real-time, and receive support from a team of dedicated dermatologists and nurses.

**A Strong Team with Vision**

MDalgorithms has a team of 25 committed employees, led by notable figures such as Dr. Yoram Harth, a board-certified dermatologist and innovative leader in dermatologic treatments, and Oded Harth, the CEO recognized in Forbes' '30 Under 30'. Oded, with his background in AI and machine learning from Stanford, is shaping the future of personalized skin and hair care.

**A New Era in Dermatology**

MDalgorithms encapsulates the idea of convenience. By bypassing the hurdles of traditional dermatologist visits—think long waits and expensive fees—they deliver clinical-grade analysis and treatments directly to consumers. Their model, leveraging advancements in telemedicine and AI, empowers users in a way that was previously unimaginable.

With its focus on personalized, effective dermatological care, MDalgorithms Inc. isn't just a player in the healthcare space; it’s a pioneer shaping the future landscape of consumer health services.

For more information about their innovative treatments, you can visit [MDalgorithms.com](https://www.mdalgorithms.com).
